original_text: So they took the money and did as they were directed. And this story has been spread among the Jews to this day.
korean_text: 군인들이 돈을 받고 가르친 대로 하였으니 이 말이 오늘날까지 유대인 가운데 두루 퍼지니라

sentences.original_text: and did as they were directed.
And this story has been spread among the Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 이야기는 유대인들 사이에 퍼졌습니다
